An object containing the algorithm to perform the Adaptive strategy.

agent - package agent
 
Agent - Class in agent
An object that contains all of the information and functionality and agent requires to play the Prisoner's Dilemma.
Agent(Strategy) - Constructor for class agent.Agent
Initialises the agent by attributing it a strategy and setting its utility to zero.
agent.strategies - package agent.strategies
 
AgentManager - Class in agent
A class that contains functionalities that are required by multiple Prisoner's Dilemma game modes.
AgentManager() - Constructor for class agent.AgentManager
 
AlwaysCooperate - Class in agent.strategies
An object containing the algorithm to perform the Always Cooperate strategy.
AlwaysCooperate() - Constructor for class agent.strategies.AlwaysCooperate
Initialises the object and attributes the strategy its name.
AlwaysDefect - Class in agent.strategies
An object containing the algorithm to perform the Always Defect strategy.
AlwaysDefect() - Constructor for class agent.strategies.AlwaysDefect
Initialises the object and attributes the strategy its name.
